entry.title: In Memory of Anton Logvynenko: Digital Artist & Aviation Enthusiast
entry.summary: The team at Microsoft Flight Simulator would like to take a moment to pay our condolences and provide tribute to a beloved member of the flight sim community – Anton Logvynenko, who passed away while carrying out a combat mission in the Kharkiv region on November 27, 2023.

entry.title: February 29th, 2024 – Development Update
entry.summary: On Wednesday, we released a new beta build (1.37.5.0) for those players enrolled in the optional Sim Update 15 (SU_15) public test. You can see the release notes on our forums here. Among other improvements, this build fixes a few known issues that were inadvertently introduced in the previous beta build, and it also has some stability enhancements.

entry.title: March 14th, 2024 – Development Update
entry.summary: Yesterday, we hosted another Developer Livestream on Twitch. Among the many topics discussed by our panel were the following highlights: Sim Update 15 has a target release date of March 26. As always, we want to ship a quality product, so there is a chance this date could be slightly delayed if SU_15 isn’t ready for release by that date.
